history.proof: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl. induction HredIn. - apply redIn0b. sfirstorder depth: 3. - apply redIn0. now apply Hincl. - apply redIn1. sfirstorder depth: 3. - sauto lq: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "incl Q Q1" on hypothesis of type "red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) R".

ctx: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) R Q1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Hincl : incl Q Q1 Unable to unify "incl Q Q1" with "red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) R".

original: intros P Q R a b HredIn Q1 Hincl. induction HredIn. - apply redIn0b. - apply redIn0. now apply Hincl. - apply redIn1. + apply Hincl in H. now apply Hincl.
